ABOUT

Who Am I?

An Informatics Engineering student at State Polytechnic of Malang with a strong passion for backend development and system logic. Actively involved in campus organizations, developing leadership and collaborative skills alongside technical expertise in coding and problem-solving. Eager to apply this blend of technical proficiency and team-oriented experience to contribute to a professional software engineering team.

Approach

Each project begins with research and understanding, followed by structured ideation and meticulous execution.

Logo

Tech Stack

Proficient in Laravel, PHP, MySQL, Java, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Git for effective version control. Internet of Things (IoT) integration and development.

A web-based application developed to facilitate the reporting, handling, and monitoring of facility repairs within the Information Technology Department at Malang State Polytechnic.
